## ðŸ’¬ Question

-   MODEL VARIANT Chat
-   MODEL NAME `gpt-3.5-turbo`
-   EXPECT MAX 30 CHARACTERS
-   EXPECT MIN 2 CHARACTERS
-   EXPECT MAX 3 WORDS
-   EXPECT EXACTLY 1 SENTENCE
-   EXPECT EXACTLY 1 LINE

```markdown
Hello {yourName}!
```

`-> {greeting}`

### Example

Example must pass the expectations

-   EXAMPLE

```text
Hello John!
```

`-> {greeting}`
